Your feedback was sent successfully. Thank you for support!
Permission to record video is required first.
Your storage space is less than 100M. You need to free up your storage space to record.
Sorry, the audio can\'t be recorded.\nYou can restart your phone then retry recording to solve the problem，or tap the CONTINUE button to record a silent video.
The video reached the max duration. Recording stopped.
Unable to find the video storage location
The video has been deleted successfully.
Recording will begin after the countdown

Higher frame rate will make videos smoother but use more CPU
We select a tutorial video of %1$s for you!
You have not recorded any video yet.

5 stars means BEST on Google Play
Enter the title of the video

Name already exists. Please choose another.
Hide the record window when record
Only use the notification bar to control recording
Tap here to check your recorded video.
Tap here to view your screenshot.
Sorry, we didn\'t find the video.
Sorry, we didn\'t find the picture.
Are you sure you want to quit? Your changes won\'t be saved.
You don\'t have stitched or edited images.
The height of some of the images is too low to stitch.
"Sorry, we can't stitch the images because of the shortage of RAM space. You can close other apps to free up RAM."
%1$s will start capturing everything that\'s displayed on your screen.
Click to cut the part that you choose
Do you want to save your changes?
Your storage space is not enough.
The file size can\'t be more than 4GB. Please shorten your edited video.
Make sure you\'ve known that and would like to change storage location to SD card.
Do you like %1$s?\nWe need your support!
You can only select up to %1$d images.
Now you can shake your phone to stop recording!

As your device system lacked the necessary components related to screen recording, screen video recording is not possible. This problem is caused by your phone system, unfortunately we can not help you. Thank you for understanding!
*Files can\'t be saved to your SD card.
Enable the usage access to allow us to give tips on appropriate occasions

%1$s can record videos so that you can watch them without Internet.
%1$s can record video calls. Record your important calls now!
Sorry, merging is not available for the video.
Sorry, the video was not saved. Please try again.
You need to connect to WiFi network.
Make sure your device is in the same wifi environment as your computer
You must select at least two videos first.
Do you like %1$s?\nShare it to your friends!
The resolutions of the chosen videos are different. It may need more time to merge the videos. Tap \"Confirm\" to save your merged video.
The music will be only played once if you turn it off.
This format of music is not supported.
Not close app when you exit the floating window
Turn it on to record with notification whenever you want

Please turn on the "Draw over other apps" authorization to ensure the proper use of %1$s.
Unable to get the image information
Your edited video has been saved!
Device has 1GB or less RAM. We recommend enabling notification access first to greatly improve recording stability.
We recommend enabling notification access to greatly improve recording stability
You can turn on the permission at any time from %1$s settings to greatly improve recording stability.
Drag the slider to select the part you want to save
Drag the slider to select the part you want to remove
Recorded by %1$s – Screen recorder for Android
I just found %1$s – screen recorder for Android that helps me easily record my screen. Try it: %2$s
Please rest assured that we do not access or archive your recorded content. Please grant the request so that we can help you to record screen.
Tap to remove the part you don\'t need
You can draw on the screen after enabling the Brush feature
You are using mobile data, which might incur data charges to download the music. Tap "Confirm" to start downloading.
No internet connection. Failed to download the music.
You are using mobile data, which might incur data charges to play the music. Tap "Confirm" to play.
No internet connection. Failed to play music.
Sorry, we don\'t support adding background images to horizontal videos.
The selected part will be used as the background of the video. You can pinch to zoom the image and move the image to select the part you want.
There is a device-based recording problem. You need to grant the permission to ensure the proper use of %1$s.
The recording has been automatically ended due to low battery.
Please charge the battery to record. If your device turns off due to low battery, your recording won\'t be saved.
Tap here to view your GIF.
You can\'t stitch GIFs. Please select again.
Drag the slider to select a segment of up to 20 seconds
You must select at least one image first.
You must select at least two images first.
Are you sure you want to delete the image?
Attention: The videos and images stored in SD card will be deleted when you uninstall %1$s.
Open the address on your computer\'s browser to download your videos and images
Tap to record a GIF. Tap again to stop recording.
Please make sure the end time is after the start time.
%1$s was stopped by system. We have automatically restarted %2$s for you.
Removing the middle will undo trimming changes. Continue?
Trimming will undo removal of the middle. Continue?
The background image has been removed because horizontal videos are not supported.
It will cost your traffic to watch the video. Are you sure to watch it?
You are using the mobile network. Video play is automatically stopped to save your traffic.
There was an error initializing the YouTube player (%1$s)
The video link can not be found.
Sorry, you can\’t submit video link without internet connection.
The video link you entered is not in correct format.
You have successfully submitted a video link. We\'ll check your video and put good videos on activity page.
We\'ll select good videos and put them on activity page. It will help your video get more views.
The selected part will be used as the intro of the video. You can pitch to zoom the image and move the image to select the part you want.
The selected part will be used as the outro of the video. You can pitch to zoom the image and move the image to select the part you want.
Failed to add intro/outro to video
The intro and outro that you added have been removed because the video orientation has been changed. Please re-add intro and outro.
Failed to login with Google. Please try again.

You have been connected to YouTube

The network status is poor. Please ensure that the connection is strong or try to reconnect.
Google Play Services login required. Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch %1$s.

Sorry, you can\'t stream live with audio without microphone permission.
Sorry, you can\'t start Live while recording screen.
Sorry, you can\'t start recording while streaming Live.
You can\'t exit the live window when streaming live.
All comments will be shown here
%1$s provides a smooth and clear live gaming experience. Share your game skills live!
Broadcast movies and TV series live with %1$s. Share your favorite shows with friends!
Use %1$s to stream tutorials live. Help more people get informed!

You can also tap the notification to record
Please turn on the floating window permission to ensure the proper use of %1$s.
Please allow the notifications of %1$s to ensure the proper use and improve the recording stability.
Please enter "Security" app - Privacy permissions - floating window management and tap %1$s to turn on the floating window permission to ensure the proper use.
Please enter system settings - Notification and Status bar - Notification manager - %1$s and tap "Allow notifications" to ensure the proper use and improve the recording stability.

You can also use the notification panel to control recording.
Press and hold the floating window.
Drag it to the exit button to close it.
You can also tap the button to start and stop recording.\nHide it on settings page if you don\'t need it.

Doesn\'t support pause and is more stable. Recommended for low-configuration devices or those that lag when recording
Select direction of the corrupted video
Live stream your amazing moments via %1$s . Share games, movies, TV shows and matches with more people: %2$s
Tap to repair again if the video still has problems
Create video editor shortcut on desktop

Go to the bottom of the page and tap
We detected a problem of your account. Please log out of the current account and log in again.
%1$s Live will be available once we complete the live optimization. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Turn it on to repair the inverted video color problem
Camera permission required to start recording. Turn on camera permission for %1$s in System Settings or change to standard recording mode.
You don\'t have the permission to stream live in the group. Please join the group on Facebook first.
Searching for groups is not available now. Please try again later.
To start streaming, you need to log in to Twitch first.
Keep recording when screen is off
Recording stopped because of device motion sensor problem. We have turned off the ‘shake to stop’ feature. Tap Start to record again.

Your account must be verified before start Live on YouTube. Please follow the verification process required by YouTube.\nAttention: Please make sure the account to be verified is the same as which you use to log in to %1$s.\nDue to YouTube restrictions, it may take 24 hours to get access to live streaming. Once activated, you can go live instantly.
You can\'t use the pop-up window because you didn\'t turn on the pop-up window option.
We suggest you to turn on the pop-up window option in system settings to ensure the proper use of %1$s.
The feature is not available without permission to display the pop-up window. Please turn on the pop-up window option in system settings.
Display pop-up window option is on. Please restart %1$s.
Display pop-up window option is on. Please turn on the feature again.
The microphone permission is off. Please turn on microphone permission to record audio. Or you can close the dialog to record a silent video.
You also need to change the account you log in to %1$s if you want to use another account to livestream.
We didn\'t find any related category.

Please ensure your network is stable and the picture quality is good during broadcasts.\n3. We may revoke your Partner Streamer certification if you fail to meet our Partner Streamer standards.

How to solve the "Failed to connect to YouTube" problem
Tap the button below to open the YouTube live dashboard page and wait until it has finished loading. Then, reopen the %1$s live page to start livestreaming.
If this solution doesn\'t work, please open %1$s on your computer and wait until it has finished loading. Then, reopen the %2$s live page to start livestreaming.

Please grant us offline access to stay logged in. If you deny this request, you will be logged out in one hour. Your livestream will not be interrupted, but some live tools (comments, alerts, live information, etc.) will be disabled.
You will be logged out in an hour.

You have been logged out. Please reauthorize to stay logged in. If you deny this request, your livestream will not be interrupted, but some live tools (comments, alerts, live information, etc.) will be disabled.
